verbs.description: [ARG0: another cnn host] [V: lost] [ARG1: his cool] [ARGM-TMP: when a panelist called leftist protesters a ‘ mob’ daily beast columnist matt lewis had a tough day at cnn on wednesday drawing the ire of not one but two cnn hosts for describing leftist protesters as a mob the first incident came when brooke baldwin tried to shut him down saying they were not going to use the m - word to describe liberal protests later that same day the conservative lewis was a panelist on cnn tonight with don lemon the same topic came up and lewis once again dared to use the m - word and the conversation came to a screeching halt as lemon grew increasingly angry the exchange i ’m waiting for liberals daily beast don lemon matt lewis journalist cnn brooke baldwin matt lewis]

another cnn host lost his cool [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: a panelist] [V: called] [ARG1: leftist protesters a ‘ mob’ daily] beast columnist matt lewis had a tough day at cnn on wednesday drawing the ire of not one but two cnn hosts for describing leftist protesters as a mob the first incident came when brooke baldwin tried to shut him down saying they were not going to use the m - word to describe liberal protests later that same day the conservative lewis was a panelist on cnn tonight with don lemon the same topic came up and lewis once again dared to use the m - word and the conversation came to a screeching halt as lemon grew increasingly angry the exchange i ’m waiting for liberals daily beast don lemon matt lewis journalist cnn brooke baldwin matt lewis
